flavorText: After the end, a new beginning.

foreignData.flavorText: Auf das Ende folgt ein neuer Anfang.
foreignData.name: Befreier der Sünden // Befreier des Fleisches
foreignData.text:
Eldrazi, die du kontrollierst, haben Wachsamkeit.
{2}, {T}, opfere eine Nicht-Eldrazi-Kreatur: Bringe einen 3/2 farblosen Eldrazi-Schrecken-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Después del final, un nuevo comienzo.
foreignData.name: Libertador del pecado // Libertador de la carne
foreignData.text:
Los Eldrazi que controlas tienen la habilidad de vigilancia.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar una criatura que no sea Eldrazi: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Horror Eldrazi incolora 3/2.

foreignData.flavorText: La fin n'est qu'un nouveau commencement.
foreignData.name: Extirpateur de péché // Extirpateur de chair
foreignData.text:
Les eldrazi que vous contrôlez ont la vigilance.
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez une créature non-Eldrazi : Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 3/2 incolore Eldrazi et Horreur.

foreignData.flavorText: Dopo la fine, un nuovo inizio.
foreignData.name: Estirpatore del Peccato // Estirpatore di Carne
foreignData.text:
Gli Eldrazi che controlli hanno cautela.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica una creatura non Eldrazi: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Orrore Eldrazi 3/2 incolore.

foreignData.flavorText: 終末の後の、新たなる始まり。
foreignData.name: 罪からの解放者 // 肉体からの解放者
foreignData.text:
あなたがコントロールするエルドラージは警戒を持つ。
{2}, {T}, エルドラージでないクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる：無色の３/２のエルドラージ・ホラー・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー ― - エルドラージ・ホラー

{2}, {T}, 엘드라지가 아닌 생물 한 개를 희생한다: 3/2 무색 엘드라지 괴수 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Depois do fim, um novo começo.

Os Eldrazi que você controla têm vigilância.

name: Extricator of Sin // Extricator of Flesh
originalText:
Eldrazi you control have vigilance.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a non-Eldrazi creature: Put a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: While resolving Extricator of Sin’s first ability, you can’t sacrifice multiple permanents to get multiple Eldrazi Horror tokens.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

text:
Eldrazi you control have vigilance.
